— Admissions for Voyage-3 are pretty much done but we will have a waiting list and there’s a good possibility that applicants will get an opportunity to jump into teams who have lost members. You can apply here.

Voyage-3 is coming — a look at some improvements!

Autobot meets Standups

In Voyage-2 we introduced Autobot, the equivalent of a remote dev project sherpa-slackbot that helps guide teams to a successful outcome (shout-out to Autobot’s architect Vampiire).

The Autobot organizes the team project process into 3 main Acts and further organizes the Acts into specific Milestones. This layer of structure helps reduce complexity and gives teams direction.

We now want to focus on improving by adding more structure to how key aspects of the project are communicated, as well as implement some industry best practices that devs may find when they get a job.

The solution? Autobot will now have a standup functionality where people can log standups easily. Autobot will also send DMs to all team members reminding them to do standups and provide an easy way to do them.
